properties.areaDesc: Outer waters from Santa Cruz Island to San Clemente Island to 60 NM offshore including San Nicolas and Santa Barbara Islands
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued January 7 at 2:18PM PST until January 9 at 9:00AM PST by NWS Los Angeles/Oxnard CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...Northwest winds 20 to 30 kt with gusts up to 35 kt and
combined seas 7 to 10 feet expected when conditions are worst.

* WHERE...Outer waters from Santa Cruz Island to San Clemente
Island to 60 NM offshore including San Nicolas and Santa
Barbara Islands.

* WHEN...For the Gale Warning, from 3 AM Wednesday to 9 AM PST
Thursday. For the Small Craft Advisory, from 9 PM this evening
to 3 AM PST Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will create dangerous sea conditions
which could capsize or damage small and large vessels.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...See the Coastal Waters Forecast (CWFLOX).
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 3 AM PST WEDNESDAY... ...GALE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM WEDNESDAY TO 9 AM PST THURSDAY
